input.sentences: parades are a fun part of community activity .
sometimes the armed forces participate . it is a great time to recognize and thank them .
at this parade | they even had a tank ! it was a crowd favorite .
the drums and bugles were a necessary part of the parade .
overall | they give the community a sense of togetherness .
output.sentences: Richard Tisei was the first openly gay Republican to run for office, but still people came out to support him.
The cadets showed up for him.
Men in tanks were there to show everyone the power of the Republicans.
A marching band played their songs proudly.
A strange old man with fake monkies drove his car around, later to be found just a proud Republican trying to spread joy.
